email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Oceanic Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, USD 50.75 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you do better than USD 50.00 per ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer USD 50.25 per ton, which is the best I can do given the current market. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to USD 50.25 per ton and the demurrage rate of USD 20,000 per day. Please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and send over the charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. Yes, the laycan remains 15-20 October. I’ll have the charter party drafted and sent to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
